text: Peter Elliot Shumlin (born March 24, 1956) is an American politician. He was the Governor of Vermont from 2011 to 2017. In 2010, he was elected Governor of Vermont. He is a member of the Democratic Party of the United States. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of Vermont Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:People from Brattleboro, Vermont
title: Peter Shumlin
